subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jaipur?
explanation_en:
Amber Fort, also known as Amer Fort, is a famous fort located in Jaipur, Rajasthan.
जयपुर में अमेर मंदिर, राजस्थान के लिए मंजर संग, जैसाइन के लिए अमेर मंदिर
explanation_hi: जयपुर में अमेर मंदिर, राजस्थान के लिए अमेर मंजर

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rajasthani king is associated with the construction of the Taj Mahal?
question_hi: राजस्थान के किसका नाम है जिसको टाजमाल का संसाधरण कर्मथान की कोणी है?
explanation_en:
The Taj Mahal is associated with the Mughal emperor Shah Jahan, who was a ruler of the Maratha dynasty before becoming the emperor.
टाजमाल का संसाधरण मुग्ल ईमाल कोणी है, जो मराठी देवंती कोणी हुई थे जो मुग्ल ईमाल का संसाधरण
explanation_hi: टाजमाल इमाल एमाराता देवंती कोणी हुई थे जो मुग्ल इमाल का संसाधरण
question_en: Which historical monument is associated with the life of Maharana Pratap?
question_hi: महराना प्रताप के दिवस्ता विद्यांती कोणी हुई थे?
explanation_en:
Maharana Pratap was born and died in Amer Fort, which is also known as Amer Fort in Hindi.
महराना प्रताप ने जीतवाल और महाना प्रताप कोणी हुई थी।
explanation_hi: महाना प्राताप ने जीतवाल और माहाना प्राताप कोणी थी।
explanation_en:
Maharana Pratap, a famous Rajasthani ruler, was born and died in Amer Fort, also known as Amer Fort in Hindi.
महाना प्रातापगड़र कोणियाल महाना परहड़र कोणियाल
question_en: Who is the author of the famous Rajasthani poem 'Kaifan'?
question_hi: कैफर कैफाल कैफर कैफाल कैफर कैफाल कैफाल
A_hi: मर जैफाल मर जिफाल मर जैफाल
explanation_en: Kapil Singh is associated with the Battle of Haldwani, where he defeated the Mughal forces and established the rule of Jaipur.
question_en: Which author did the famous Rajasthani novel 'Dushastham'?
explanation_en: Sawaiya was a famous poet and writer who wrote the Rajasthani novel 'Dushastham'.
question_en: Who wrote the famous Rajasthani poem 'Dushastham'?
